column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A foreign man was found dead on December 13
column5: in the toilet of Harrys Restaurant # 219
column10: Phnom Penh.------The deceased foreigner was named as WILLIAM ALEXANDER TRUEMAN a Canadian
column12: the foreigner arrived at the Harry’s restaurant
column13: ’with a local girl.  They sat down for a drink and the man went to the bathroom and did not return. Staff were alerted and found the body.------. The body was taken to Steung Meanchey pagoda.------AREY NEWS
